text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
The Umamusume who entrust their
feelings to the training Umamusume are
known as successor Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Once you have completed your training
and had your Umamusume registered in the
Hall of Fame, you will be able to select
her as a successor.
color_text_info_list:
registered in the 
Hall of Fame

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Depending on the Umamusume's factors
and feelings, you can receive various
benefits, such as improving starting
stats and acquiring new skills.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Even if you choose her as a successor, 
you won't lose that Umamusume, 
so don't be worried!
